text: Hello! Can I please talk to you about donating to a charity named Save The Children?
hello i would like to help too even its a bit
That would be wonderful! We really appreciate all of your help and generosity. Every little bit will help the children we are trying to save. Would you like to hear more about our organization?
yes i do

Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. Your donation is essential to help ensure children's rights to health, education, and safety.
oh ok thats fine
Great to hear that you like our mission statement! Where would you like to focus your donation? Toward children's health, education, or safety?
yes like 5 dollars

Excellent! We really appreciate such a fine and generous donation! I have exciting news for you. Right now, Save The Children is matching every donation from $10 and up. Would you like to increase your donation to $10 to double your help?
oh yep thats very good i know these children needs help for sure
Wonderful! This is so exciting to us. Can we mark you down as a potential donor for next year as well?
very good to do
Thank you so much! Can we contact you by mail, phone, or email?
yes thats nice
Sounds fantastic. Do you think you could spread the word about Save The Children to your family and friends for us?
yes i could do that
We really appreciate it. So to review, we have you down for a $10 donation to Save The Children. Is that correct?
yes that is

We are so pleased by your donation today! This is really going to make a difference in these children's lives. Is it okay to go ahead and charge your credit card today, or would you prefer to mail a check?
yes thats ok
